fb2.Text: How much do you have left?
Not much, sir. Resources have been running scarce lately. Is this enough?
Yes... this should be enough. Thank you.
Of course, sir. You have done much for our village; this is but a small favour to return.
May I inquire what you need this for though, sir?
Ah, this is simply for a friend.
Have a good night then, sir.

fb3.Text: How did it get this severe?
And Phoenix says he's run out of medicine. Oh, please stop coughing... please...

fb4.Text: What? What do you mean there's no more??
Phoenix told me he'd given the rest to you only yesterday. He told me that you should have some to spare.
I'm sorry. I really don't have any left.
My child -- my child is dying. I need that medicine. You can't have used it all.
I'm sorry. It was an emergency for me as well.
Fuck you. My child is dying, and you're justifying this with your own emergency?
